articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Monday to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae and Ri Yong Ho, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK. Attending there were also leading officials of the party, the state and the army, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, labor innovators and other working people.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the WPK on June 19, 1964 was a historic event of special significance in developing the WPK and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The history of the WPK led by Kim Jong Il is shining as a sacred revolutionary one in which he developed the party into an organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people and led the revolutionary cause of Juche to one victory after another.
					
					 He was the outstanding builder of the WPK who developed the party into a Juche-oriented revolutionary party.
					
					 He considered it as his lifetime task to develop the WPK into an eternal party of President Kim Il Sung and made a new history of building a party of the leader under the banner of imbuing the whole party with Kimilsungism.
					
					 The WPK has advanced along the road of victory only the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun started in Mt. Paektu, weathering all sorts of tempests in world politics. This was the precious fruition of Kim Jong Il's original idea of party building and leadership and a striking demonstration of their greatness and eternal vitality.
					
					 Kim Jong Il taught the immutable truth that the army means the party, the state and the people and made sure that all the party work was oriented to the implementation of the Songun revolutionary line. Thanks to his outstanding leadership Korea which was once mercilessly deprived of its sovereignty because of its weak army came to demonstrate its might as the world's military power with matchless national power and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.  
					
					Kim Jong Il's Juche-oriented idea of party building and cause are being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has opened up a new chapter of the cause of immortalizing the leader, making sure that Kim Jong Il's immortal revolutionary career and feats shine for all ages and the WPK holds him in high esteem as eternal general secretary and develops into the glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il,. 
					
					 The WPK, the army and the people will successfully materialize the idea of Kim Jong Il and accomplish his cause with the great national pride and honor of holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the center of the leadership and unity.
					
					 The reporter underscored the need to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary and eternal Songun sun for all ages with pure conscience and moral obligation and firmly uphold and preserve his idea and feats.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Slams U.S. Arms Buildup against DPRK
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Slams U.S. Arms Buildup against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Monday as regards the recent U.S. open arms buildup against the DPRK. 
					 The commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea on June 12 called for additionally deploying a squadron of attack-helicopters in south Korea and increasing the capacity of missile defense system. He, talking about "threat from north Korea", said that the U.S. military would make its implementation a priority.
					
					 The U.S. Defense Department announced on June 13 that the U.S.-Japan-south Korea joint military exercises, first of its kind, would be staged from June 21 in the West and South Seas of Korea and a U.S. nuclear-powered carrier would take part in the exercises. 
					
					 There took place in Washington on June 14 a military confab between American master and south Korean servants to discuss the issues of stepping up U.S. arms buildup in south Korea and making south Korea an advance base for the implementation of the U.S. strategy for domination over Asia. This is a wanton violation of the Armistice Agreement and an open provocation against the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. is apt to vociferate about the "provocation" by the DPRK, but the facts prove that it is an arch criminal who escalates military tension by pursuing hostile policy towards the DPRK and making military provocations against it one after another. 
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in intentionally aggravating the situation of the Korean Peninsula is to lay hurdles in the general advance of the DPRK for stepping up economic construction and improving people's living standard, and turn south Korea into a servant executing its war policy. 
					
					 The U.S. arms buildup moves in south Korea is a prelude to a regional war targeting not only the DPRK but also several Northeast Asian countries as they threaten the peace and security of the region, to say nothing of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK is watching with high vigilance the U.S. preparations for war being expanded in a phased manner. It will increase its self-defence capabilities in every way to protect sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation.

articles.title: Conservative Group of S. Korea Warned of Its Moves to Enact "Law on Human Rights in North"
articles.content:
Conservative Group of S. Korea Warned of Its Moves to Enact "Law on Human Rights in North"
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea (DLAK) Monday issued a statement accusing the conservative group of south Korea including the "Saenuri Party" of making a desperate bid to enact "law on human rights in the north" at the 19th-term "National Assembly" at any cost. 
					 The statement said: 
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" is making such desperate efforts to enact the law, prompted by its bid to divert elsewhere the grievances of the people growing due to its unpopular policies and human rights abuses and kick up a row about "the forces following the north." Through this the party seeks to stifle the pro-reunification forces advocating alliance with the north and justify its moves to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen in an effort to use those moves for its operation to win "the presidential election."
					
					 The above-said moves are dangerous ones to throw a hurdle in the way of implementing the north-south joint declaration, further bedevil the inter-Korean relations and ignite a war.
					
					 The DLAK vehemently denounces the moves as another grave politically-motivated provocation to the DPRK and a reckless action going against national reconciliation, unity and reunification. 
					
					 The enactment of the law would mean the appearance of another anti-reunification fascist law besides the "Security Law" in south Korea. 
					
					 This would also fan up the confrontation between the compatriots in the north and the south in social system and ideology and thus drive the inter-Korean relations into uncontrollable collapse and throw greater hurdles in the way of reunification.
					
					 This would, at the same time, help the conservative group further intensify the fascist crackdown upon the progressive, democratic and pro-reform forces in south Korea.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" should not work hard to enact such ridiculous law but repeal the SL and adopt a law guaranteeing the rights of the south Koreans wantonly violated by the Lee Myung Bak group.
					
					 If the clan of the "Saenuri Party" seeks the passage of the bill through the "National Assembly" with its desperate moves, this will entail irrevocable consequences and then the conservative group will be entirely accountable for them.

articles.title: Senior Myanmar Party Official Meets WPK Delegation
articles.content:
Senior Myanmar Party Official Meets WPK Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar and prime minister of the Yangon Regional Government on June 16 met and had a friendly talk with the visiting delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK. 
					 At the meeting the prime minister of the Yangon Regional Government said he was pleased that the cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The friendly relations between the two countries forged by leaders of Myanmar and President Kim Il Sung are favorably developing, he said, adding the peoples of the two countries are struggling to protect their sovereignty and achieve socio-economic development despite the U.S. sanctions and pressure. 
					
					 The DPRK has military power so strong that no one dares provoke it, he said. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the DPRK would win shining victory in building an economic power, too, as a political and military power under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Calls for Manuring and Cultivating Crops in Responsible Manner
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Calls for Manuring and Cultivating Crops in Responsible Manner
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a field survey of farming at the Chilgol Vegetable Farm in Mangyongdae District and Ryongchon Co-op Farm in Hwangju County, North Hwanghae Province.
					 Going round the fields alive with immediate cultivation of crops, the premier acquainted himself with earing of first crops, shooting of crops and manuring before discussing issues arising in the farm work.
					
					 He stressed the need for the farms associated with undying leadership feats of great persons of Mt. Paektu to take the lead in manuring and cultivating crops on a scientific and technical basis as required by the recent weather conditions and their biological features.
					
					 True to the WPK's call to enlist and concentrate all efforts on farming, the premier took measures for the supply of greater quantities of farming materials to farms.
					
					 He also visited the construction site of Mammary Gland Center at the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					
					 He discussed ensuring the best quality in the construction and satisfactorily supplying raw and other materials needed for the project.

articles.title: Widow of Ex-President of ITF Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Widow of Ex-President of ITF Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Han Chun Hui, widow of Choe Hong Hui, ex-president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF), and her party visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They looked round historic relics, being briefed on the glorious revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and his patriotic and revolutionary family.
					
					 She and her party also visited the Taekwon-Do Holy Center land, the e-library at Kim Il Sung University, the Exhibition of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, etc. and appreciated a demonstration performance given by Taekwon-Do instructors of the DPRK at the Taekwon-Do Hall.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised as Great Author
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised as Great Author
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- 48 years have passed since leader Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 He authored many works while leading the party for half a century.
					
					 Among the works published by him in the 1960s are "Broadcasting Is an Important Political Medium" and "Film Artistes Are Standard-Bearers on the Ideological Front of Our Party".
					
					 In those works, he clarified an idea of strengthening the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks around the leader.
					
					 Among his works are also "On Some Immediate Tasks for Ideological Work of the Party to Model the Whole Society on Kimilsungism" and "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building." 
					
					 In those works he set forth the tasks and ways to develop the Workers' Party of Korea into the eternal party of President          Kim Il Sung, model the whole society on the idea of the leader in order to carry forward the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il gave scientific answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in achieving the unity of the revolutionary ranks in some of his works.
					
					 Among them are "On the Juche Idea" and "On Some Problems of Education in the Juche Idea".
					
					 He in his works put forward the idea of building the People's Army into the army of the leader and the party.
					
					 Among those works are "The People's Army Should Devotedly Safeguard Its Leader, Party, Social System and Country" and "Let Us Strengthen the People's Army into Invincible Ranks".
					
					 He also authored works calling for further strengthening the unity and cohesion of the Party and people in conformity with the intrinsic requirements of socialist society and as required by the developing revolution and underscoring the need to give full play to the popular masses' creative ingenuity and combining the work for the unity of the collective with various mass movements.
					
					 He published in the new century such works as "The Revolutionary Comradeship Is the Foundation of the Single-minded Unity and an Engine of Our Revolution" and "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might".
					
					 In those works he encouraged the whole party and all people in the struggle for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Genius of Literature and Arts
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Genius of Literature and Arts
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- It has been 48 years since leader Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on June 19, 1964.
					 In the period he energetically led all sectors of the literature and arts in the country, thus bringing the era of the Renaissance in the 20th century.
					
					 He authored a lot of celebrated works to give perfect answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in the development of the Juche-based literature and arts. Typical of them are "Theory of Cinematic Art", "On the Art of Opera", "Theory of Dancing Art", "On the Theatrical Arts" and "Theory of Musical Art".
					
					 Under his energetic guidance masterpieces were adapted for films, operas, dramas and novels, including "The Sea of Blood" and "The Fate of a Self-Defence Corps Man" created by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. In this course the DPRK witnessed the emergence of "The Sea of Blood"-style operas and "The Mountain Shrine"-style dramas.
					
					 Multi-part feature film "The Nation and Destiny", which represents the Juche-based literature and arts in the 20th century, was also produced along with other multi-part feature films "Star of Korea" and "The Sun of the Nation".
					
					 In recent years grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", light comedy "Echo of Mountain" and drama "We Will Recollect Today" were created and performed to encourage the army and people in the dynamic drive for building a thriving country.
					
					 Famous art works of other countries were also created as operas and drama in the DPRK. They are "A Dream of Red Mansions," "A Sentry under a Neon Lamp" and "Evgeni Onegin".
					
					 The immortal feats of Kim Jong Il, a genius of the literature and arts, will go down forever.

articles.title: Relics of Koguryo Kingdom Unearthed in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Relics of Koguryo Kingdom Unearthed in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Ruined walls and mural tomb, believed to date back to the period of Koguryo Kingdom (277 B.C.- 668 A.D), have been unearthed in Pyongyang, the capital city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The relics, including roofing tiles, newly unearthed in Ansan-dong and Jongphyong-dong, Phyongchon District, are pieces of the ruined exterior wall of the Walled City of Pyongyang.
					
					 The discovery shows that it was a well-trimmed stone wall, with its foundation built in a peculiar way.
					
					 Meanwhile, a survey of the ruined walls of Joktusan in the area of Sonnae-dong in Mangyongdae District testified to the fact that the walls were built in the same way with the Walled City of Pyongyang and they served for defending the western Walled City of Pyongyang.
					
					 In another development, a mural tomb and a stone-chamber earthen tomb were unearthed in the Central Botanical Garden, which are believed to date back to around the 6th century.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates a bylined article to the 15th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction". 
					 The work was published on June 19, 1997. Years since then witnessed persistent struggle to preserve Juche character and national character under the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the paper said, and went on:
					
					 Now Korean-style socialism of Juche triumphs by dint of independent revolutionary line and working mode.
					
					 The WPK has constantly maintained the revolutionary mode of independently solving all the issues of the revolution and construction by its independent conviction and determination.
					
					 It is vigorously advancing under the banner of independence despite all sanctions and blockades by the imperialists. 
					
					 All the people are united close around the leader in thinking and will and in terms of moral obligation and whole society is like a big harmonious family. This is the essential character of Korean-style socialism and the source of tremendous strength of the DPRK.
					
					 Everyone sings and dances to the peculiar tune of the Korean nation and is fond of traditional national costumes. This is the true picture of Korean socialism replete with national character.
					
					 Thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the national spirit is in full effect in the DPRK and Korean-style socialism with strong Juche character and national character serves as a cradle of life for all the people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Heightening Vigilance against Imperialists' "Peace" Ballad
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Heightening Vigilance against Imperialists' "Peace" Ballad 
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The imperialists' loud talk about "disarmament" and "detente" is just a trick to cover up their nature, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is necessary to increase vigilance against the U.S. imperialists' arms buildup being stepped up under the signboard of "disarmament", in particular.
					
					 The U.S. is stepping up the arms modernization which is irrelevant to disarmament.
					
					 Recently it has buckled down to the establishment of the missile defense system (MD) in Europe opposed by Russia.
					
					 The U.S. views the MD as one of the most practical means for containing and attacking by force not only its competitors but other countries which incur its displeasure.
					
					 In recent years, the U.S. is set to develop and round off a war scenario.
					
					 It is putting an emphasis on attaining its purpose for aggression while talking about the "policy of giving priority to the Asia-Pacific".
					
					 "Peace" ballad touted by the U.S. is a prelude to war.
					
					 The world peace-loving people should heighten vigilance against the dangerous aim sought by the imperialists behind their loud call for "peace" and "disarmament".
					
					 No illusion should be harbored about the imperialists and national capacity be increased for self-defense.
					
					 If the progressives are awakened and struggle against the imperialists in unity, they can certainly render ineffective the imperialists' sinister attempt and cunning deception.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Lee Myung Bak Group Arch Criminal Escalating Inter-Korean Tensions
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms Lee Myung Bak Group Arch Criminal Escalating Inter-Korean Tensions
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- South Korea is set to purchase modern weapons including "CBU-105" and missiles worth hundreds of millions of U.S. dollars from the United States and deploy them for an actual war.
					 On June 12 the artillery corps of south Korea staged madcap MLRS drill in the forefront Cholwon County, south Korean Kangwon Province in coordinated action with the 210th artillery brigade of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces. At dawn on June 11 there was an inspection of emergency military posture for promptly countering the "attack by the north's long-range artillery pieces" in the land and air at the instructions of the puppet minister of Defense.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 These are reckless moves of escalating military confrontation and tensions between the north and the south and disturbing the peace and stability not only in the Korean Peninsula but the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The massive arms buildup stepped up by the puppet forces is a dangerous move that can be seen on the eve of war, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group, finding itself in an extremely serious ruling crisis after being condemned by the public at home and abroad, is seeking a way out in provoking a war against the DPRK in conspiracy with outsiders.
					
					 The U.S. has shifted the focus of its military strategy to Asia and Japan-south Korea military nexus has become undisguised. The saber-rattling kicked up by the Lee group following large-scale arms buildup against this backdrop signifies ill-boding development.
					
					 This situation gives a clear answer to the question what is the starting point of the tensions mounting on the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity and who is its chieftain.
					
					 The Lee group is a dangerous warlike force as it brings war holocaust to the Korean nation through military provocations and racket of escalating tensions, being opposed to peace and reunification of Korea.
					
					 Detente of the peninsula and regional peace and stability can never be expected as long as the Lee group is allowed to brandish weapons for a war in collusion with its American and Japanese masters.

articles.title: U.S. Plan for Massive Arms Build-up against DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
U.S. Plan for Massive Arms Build-up against DPRK Assailed 
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now mulling delivering to south Korea ultramodern military hardware worth 325 million US dollars. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such arms delivery is aimed to help the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, the arch criminal who drove the inter-Korean relations into the lowest ebb, prolong its remaining days and instigate it to further escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and thus push the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' deliberate and premeditated arms sale is now creating a touch-and-go situation on the peninsula.
					
					 The Lee group is now seeking a way out of its serious political crisis in escalating the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 That is why it is hailing the U.S. projected arms sale. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are availing themselves of the confrontation hysteria of the Lee group and egging it onto escalated military stand-off with the DPRK, pursuant to their military scenario for putting Asia-Pacific under their control. Herein lies the gravity of the U.S. arms sale to south Korea. 
					
					 Having made a switchover in its foreign policy to focusing on Asia-Pacific as part of its strategy for dominating the world, the U.S. is now set to carry out its strategy of siege and pressure upon big powers around the peninsula with it as a strategic stronghold.
					
					 It is the ulterior intention of the U.S. to whip the Lee group on the confrontation with the DPRK and push the situation on the peninsula to the brink of war in a bid to get on its nerves and shift the responsibility for the tensions onto it before starting a war.
					
					 It is beyond any doubt that the U.S. arms build-up will reduce the peninsula to a more dangerous hotspot and, consequently, disturb peace and security in Asia-Pacific. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to cool-headedly think over the serious consequences to be entailed by its reckless military act of fanning up the military confrontation between the north and the south of Korea.

articles.title: S. Korea Announces Plan for Combined Drill
articles.content:
S. Korea Announces Plan for Combined Drill
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The "Chongryong" unit of the south Korean puppet Marine Corps announced that it would stage a combined drill in the areas of Kanghwa County, Inchon City and Kimpho City of Kyonggi Province from June 18 to 20, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The south Korean warmongers claimed that the drill was aimed to establish unified defense posture of civilians, government, military and police to cope with "provocation" from the north.
					
					 The Marine Corps, police, reserve forces and relevant organs will reportedly be involved in the drill.
					
					 The puppet forces overheated with fever for a war against the DPRK are busy staging war exercises under various codenames, escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen and tension on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Security Guard for Former Dictator of S. Korea Criticized by Public
articles.content:
Security Guard for Former Dictator of S. Korea Criticized by Public
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Traitor Chun Doo Hwan, chief culprit of the May 18 Kwangju massacre in south Korea, was disclosed to have received security guard from the Police Agency, sparking off public criticism. 
					 The south Korean newspaper Hangyore in its editorial on June 15 revealed that Chun Doo Hwan was placed under armed security guard offered by the Police Agency during his recent visits to a military academy and a golf course.
					
					 Matter is that the agency has refused to disclose the data on conveniences offered to traitor Chun, calling it a "security item", the editorial pointed out.
					
					 That day a lawmaker from the Democratic United Party proposed a draft amendment to "law on provision of privileges to former presidents" which called for excluding those who were dislodged after being "impeached" or confirmed as guilty from the list of "ex-presidents" qualified for guard.
					
					 He accused the police of seeking to offer security forces and equipment in the future, too, as there are no limits as regards the provision of guard for the former "presidents" in law now in force.
					
					 Problem is the police provision of round-the-clock guard for traitor Chun who is wallowing in luxury, he said. Chun was convicted of having fostered civil strife and other charges at a court and is making default on the payment of a huge amount of money.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution's Suppression of Member of Progressive Organization under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution's Suppression of Member of Progressive Organization under Fire 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law", the Civic and Public Joint Measure Committee against the Suppression of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) and other civic and public organizations of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on June 12 at which they slammed the unjust suppression of Choe Tong Jin, chief editor of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon. 
					 Speakers at the press conference accused the prosecution of arresting Choe on charge of violation of the "Security Law".
					
					 This is evidently a politically motivated action, they held, and went on:
					
					 These days Lee Myung Bak and other heavy-weights of the present "government" are uttering without hesitation words "forces following the north" and intensifying the crackdown upon the progressive organizations. The arrest of Choe Tong Jin was part of this repressive campaign. 
					
					 The "government" authorities are suppressing members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon under the pretext that they have made efforts for reconciliation and cooperation between the south and the north of Korea and advocated the peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 A press release was read out there. 
					
					 It said that those labeled "forces following the north" by the Lee Myung Bak "government" are the people who support the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and strive hard to eradicate the pro-Japanese and pro-U.S. forces and build society where 99 percent of the population will enjoy a happy life, too. 
					
					 The conservative forces going against national reunification will surely face punishment by history as they perpetrate a "witch-hunting of forces following the north" under the watchword of the outdated coloring operation, the press release said, adding:
					
					 The present "government" should free Choe Tong Jin and other leading members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon as early as possible and stop the unjust suppression at once.

articles.title: Conservative Media of S. Korea Accused of Their Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Conservative Media of S. Korea Accused of Their Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea Monday made public a statement denouncing the conservative media of south Korea for their evermore malignant smear campaign against the DPRK. 
					 Shortly ago, Chosun Ilbo, Yonhap News and other conservative media of south Korea slandered the popular policies of the DPRK  and went the lengths of daring defame the dignity and social system of the DPRK over the issue of reunion of separated families and relatives which had been arranged in the past, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the conservative media cited unidentified sources like "news from the north" and "correspondent," when all lies and fabrications cooked to hurl mud at the DPRK proved futile, in a crafty bid to make their propaganda sound "objective" and "plausible." 
					
					 It is long since the ultra-right conservative media in south Korea were reduced to poor-looking waiting maids of the ruling quarters who maintain their existence by serving the "government" authorities after losing elementary positions and images as media and tools of the puppet Intelligence Service, den of conspiratorial plots and intrigues. 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations were driven to catastrophe though they had favorably developed after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the situation prevailing in Korea is so grave that a war may break out any moment. This is also attributable to the ultra-right conservative media which zealously followed the confrontation policy of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors. 
					
					 The alarming anti-DPRK smear propaganda of the conservative media stoked distrust and antagonism obstructive to national reconciliation, unity and aspiration and mercilessly chilled the south Koreans' desire and wishes for reunification. 
					
					 The situation goes to clearly prove that it is impossible to achieve progress of south Korean society, national unity and peace of Korea as long as there are in south Korea such ultra-right conservative media bereft of even an iota of conscience and reason as media representing justice and truth. 
					
					 Only a stern judgment and a shameful end await the conservative media going against the mindset of people and aspiration of the nation. 
					
					 All the media persons in the DPRK will force the puppet conservative media of south Korea, a group of the most reptile media in the world and worst traitors to the nation, to pay for all their thrice-cursed crimes committed in history.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Carried by Bangladeshi, Iranian Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Carried by Bangladeshi, Iranian Papers
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried the full text of the congratulatory speech made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations on June 6, 2012, the 66th anniversary of the KCU. The Bangladeshi paper Blits carried it on June 12 while the Iranian paper Iran News on June 13.
					 In his speech Kim Jong Un expressed his firm will to invariably inherit the noble outlook of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the future and the rising generations and indicated the tasks and ways for bringing up the KCU members to be the reserve forces, knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy, who would be responsible for the future destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					 The papers carried photos of Kim Jong Un present at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union.
					
					 The Iranian paper also carried Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation".
					
					 The work, published on April 27, 2012, clarifies the undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in land management and indicates the general orientation and tasks for face-lifting the country's land as befitting that of a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet Website of Regional Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet Website of Regional Organization
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea posted on its Internet website on June 11 the full text of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche".
					 The work, published on April 6, 2012, clarifies that it is a principled requirement for the victorious advance of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. It indicates the tasks for steadily developing the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Thai Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Thai Organization
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand issued a statement on June 13 to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 From the outset of his office at the WPK Central Committee, Kim Jong Il made sure that the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung was thoroughly applied to the party building and activities, taking hold on it as the guiding idea of the party.
					
					 It was thanks to Kim Jong Il that the WPK has become the party strong in independence, unshaken in the face of all ordeals of history as well as a powerful party which is dynamically advancing the socialist cause.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward Kim Jong Il's cause, the WPK will shed its brighter rays as an invincible over the world in the future, too.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Chile and Egypt carried articles to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The June issue of Chilean paper Remolino Popular said in an article titled "Road followed by the DPRK" that highlight in the history of modern DPRK is the struggle for independence, adding the DPRK will never retreat from the road of independence.
					
					 The world has admired the invincibility of Korean-style socialism and paid respects to the DPRK that has maintained socialism, the article said.
					
					 It stressed the Korean people will keep to the path of independence, Songun and socialism following their top leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Egyptian paper Al-Misaiya on June 6 in an article titled "Songun politics and Korean Peninsula" said Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as a basic political mode under socialism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il trained the service personnel of the People's Army into a-match-for-a hundred fighters and directed great efforts into developing the national defence industry under the uplifted banner of Songun, the article noted.
					
					 Kim Jong Il established the traits of attaching importance to the military affairs in the society and encouraged the service persons and people to turn out in a struggle for defending socialism, it added.
					
					 It noted even though the U.S. and its followers frequently stage war rehearsals in the Korean Peninsula to increase tensions, they can not disturb the peace in the region as long as the DPRK pursues the Songun politics.
					
					 Korea is sure to be reunified under the banner of Songun, concluded the article.

articles.title: Foreign Political Party and Organization Criticize Lee Myung Bak Group for Slandering DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Political Party and Organization Criticize Lee Myung Bak Group for Slandering DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Peru in a statement on June 12 accused the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea of slandering the celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the founding of the Korean Children's Union (KCU).
					 The international community admired and congratulated the celebrations in the DPRK, an expression of noble outlook on upcoming generations and future that can only be found in the DPRK, said the statement, adding:
					
					 The Lee group of traitors, however, defamed the auspicious event of its fellow countrymen and again insulted the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 This revealed the black-hearted intentions of the Lee group to seek confrontation and war.
					
					 The group deserves punishment for having intensified the moves against reunification and the DPRK running counter to the June 15 era of reunification. 
					
					 Those countries which instigate the Lee group to make provocations against the DPRK and patronize it can not evade their responsibilities for the consequences.
					
					 The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea in a statement on June 11 rebuked the Lee Myung Bak "government" for slandering the celebrations of the Day of the Sun, the birthday of the KCU and other celebration events in the DPRK.
					
					 The statement extended full support to the steadfast will of the army and people of the DPRK to force the Lee regime that pushes the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war to pay for it and defend the socialist country of Juche.

articles.title: Thai Organization Hails June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Thai Organization Hails June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association issued a statement on June 13 to mark the 12th anniversary of the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The declaration is a cornerstone of the development of the north-south relations and a great programme for Korea's reunification that indicates the basic idea and fundamental principles for achieving national reconciliation, unity and reunification as well as ways for carrying them out, said the statement, adding:
					
					 The movement for reunification that had made good progress after the adoption of the declaration met serious challenges since the conservative forces took power in south Korea.
					
					 After taking office, the Lee Myung Bak clique totally denied the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and refused to implement them, thus pushing the north-south relations that had favorably developed to the lowest ebb. 
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un expressed his willingness to join hands with any one who truly wants the reunification of the country and the peace and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association is firmly convinced that the cause of reunification of Korea will surely be accomplished by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Acto por 48o aniversario de inicio de trabajo de Kim Jong Il en PTC
articles.content:
Acto por 48o aniversario de inicio de trabajo de Kim Jong Il en PTC
						
　Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 48o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					　Asistieron al acto los miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae y Ri Yong Ho y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los benemeritos laborales y trabajadores. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC.
					
					El inicio del trabajo del Dirigente en el CC del PTC el 19 de junio de 1964 fue un acontecimiento historico de suma importancia en el desarrollo del PTC y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, dijo el informante y continuo: 
					
					La historia de direccion del Dirigente sobre el PTC es el sagrado trayecto revolucionario en que desarrollo esta agrupacion politica como organizadora y orientadora de todas las victorias del pueblo coreano y condujo a la unica senda del triunfo la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					El Dirigente fue el destacado constructor del PTC que lo fortalecio como partido revolucionario de tipo jucheano.
					
					Tomando por su mision de toda la vida construir el PTC como eterno partido del Presidente Kim Il Sung, allano la nueva era de construccion del partido del lider con la meta de transformar todo el partido segun el Kimilsungismo. 
					
					El PTC pudo impulsar solo a la victoria la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu, sin vacilacion alguna ante la complicada situacion mundial. Esto es el noble fruto de la original idea y direccion del Dirigente en materia de la construccion del partido y la evidente manifestacion de su noble personalidad y eterna vitalidad. 
					
					Gracias a la sabia guia del Dirigente, quien aclaro la verdad de que el ejercito es precisamente el partido, el Estado y el pueblo e hizo realizar todas las laboras del partido con rumbo a materializar la linea revolucionaria del Songun, nuestra patria se ha convertido en la potencia militar y poseedor de armas nucleares. 
					
					La autoctona idea y la causa del Dirigente en materia de construccion del partido se llevan  adelante por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC. 
					
					Al realizar la causa de eternidad del lider, hizo glorificar generacion tras generacion la vida revolucionaria y las proezas del Dirigente y enaltecerle como eterno Secretario General del PTC y desarrollarlo como glorioso partido de            Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					El PTC, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea con el gran orgullo y dignidad de tener a Kim Jong Un como centro de direccion y unidad materializaran hasta el final la idea y la causa del Dirigente.
					
					Todos deben enaltecer generacion tras generacion al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como eterno Secretario General del PTC y eterno Sol del Songun guardando la pura conciencia revolucionaria y obligacion moral y defender con firmeza su idea y hazanas.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia aumento armamentista de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia aumento armamentista de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) --  Con respecto a que Estados Unidos intensifica abiertamente el aumento armamentista contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 18 la siguiente respuesta a la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea:
					El pasado dia 12, el comandante de las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea insistio en la necesidad de emplazar adicionalmente un batallon de helicopteros de ataque de EE.UU. y fortalecer la capacidad del sistema antimisiles y dijo publicamente que la capa militar de su pais concedera la prioridad al respecto. 
					
					El Departamento de Defensa norteamericano publico el dia 13 que iniciara desde el dia 21 en el Mar Oeste y el Mar Sur de Corea los primeros ejercicios militares EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea introduciendo hasta el portaaviones nuclear norteamericano. 
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en Washington el complot militar entre el amo y los lacayos para promover el aumento de las fuerzas armadas norteamericanas estacionadas en el suelo surcoreano y convertirlo en la base avanzada favorable a la realizacion de la estrategia norteamericana de dominio sobre Asia. 
					
					Esto es la violacion brutal al Acuerdo de Armisticio y una provocacion abierta a la RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. suele cuestionar la "provocacion" de alguien, pero todos los hechos muestran que el imperio es el autor que hostiliza a la RPDC y agrava la tension con sus incesantes provocaciones militares.
					
					EE.UU. agrava intencionalmente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana con el fin de crear obstaculos ante la marcha general de la RPDC por la construccion economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo y subyugar al Sur de Corea como lacayo de su politica de guerra de agresion. 
					
					La intencion de EE.UU. de aumentar sus fuerzas armadas en el Sur de Corea amenazando la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region es el preludio de la guerra contra la RPDC y otros varios paises del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Observamos con alta vigilancia los preparativos de la guerra de agresion de EE.UU. que se desarrollan de modo escalonado y fortaleceremos por todos los medios la capacidad de autodefensa nacional para defender la soberania y la dignidad del pais y la nacion.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones de PTC y PSDUM
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones de PTC y PSDUM
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 14 las conversaciones entre las delegaciones del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) y del Partido de Solidaridad y Desarrollo de la Union de Myanmar (PSDUM).
					Participaron en la ocasion por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion del PTC encabezada por Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, y Kim Sok Chol, embajador en Myanmar, y por la birmana, los miembros de la delegacion del PSDUM dirigida por el miembro del Comite Ejecutivo Central y secretario de organizacion del PSDUM.
					
					Ambas partes se informaron de las actividades de sus respectivos partidos e intercambiaron criterios sobre los asuntos de desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos partidos y otros de interes mutuo.
					
					El secretario de organizacion birmano dijo que desea de todo corazon, en representacion del PSDUM, el gobierno y el pueblo, que Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un conduzca a la brillante victoria al pueblo coreano.
					
					Destaco que bajo las orientaciones de Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung y Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, eminentes lideres, la RPDC se ha convertido en la potencia invencible.
					
					Recalco que tener a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un como Maximo Dirigente es gran fortuna del pueblo coreano.
					
					La visita de la delegacion del PTC a Myanmar es una expresion de apoyo y solidaridad con el PSDUM, senalo y expreso su voluntad de realizar activamente la cooperacion y el intercambio entre ambos partidos.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim analiza estado de agricultura y construccion de centro
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim analiza estado de agricultura y construccion de centro
						
　Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea recorrio la Granja Especializada en Verduras de Chilgol del capitalino municipio Mangyongdae y la Granja Cooperativa de Ryongchon del distrito de Hwangju de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte donde hizo conocimiento del estado de agricultura.
					　Al dar vueltas por las parcelas donde estan en pleno abonamiento y cuidado de los cultivos, el premier analizo concretamente el estado de espigueo de las plantas de primera cosecha y el de ramificacion y abonamiento de cultivos y debatio los problemas presentados.
					
					　Enfatizo que las granjas impregnadas de las imborrables hazanas de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, deben ser ejemplares en realizar de modo cientifico y tecnico el abonamiento y cuidado de los cultivos conforme a la actual condicion climatica y las caracteristicas biologicas de los cultivos.
					
					　Organizo una labor para enviar muchas materiales agricolas a las granjas de acuerdo con el llamamiento del partido  de concentrar y movilizar todas las fuerzas en la agricultura.
					
					　Por otra parte, el recorrio el campo de construccion del Centro de Glandula Mamaria de la Casa de Maternidad de Pyongyang.
					
					　En el mismo terreno fueron discutidos los problemas de asegurar en el maximo nivel la calidad de la obra y ofrecer satisfactoriamente los materiales necesarios a la construccion.
